headline: Teledyne Completes Acquisition of Select Aerospace and Defense Electronics Businesses of Excelitas
summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif., February 03, 2025--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) ("Teledyne") announced today the successful completion of the acquisition of select aerospace and defense electronics businesses from Excelitas Technologies Corp. ("Excelitas") for approximately $710 million. The acquisition includes the optical systems business known under the Qioptiq® brand based in Northern Wales, UK, as well as the U.S.-based advanced electronic systems business.
